title: mfw people get triggered by a Clan Tags Name LUL

replies.body: Probably some slur about black people like the countless others I've seen lately.

no you dumb fuk I may tell people to ''kys'' but being racist no man I dont go like that 

wasn't even my clan tag, its all you fuk bois in this board bicthing that people with ''triggering' tags and  saying shitt that they should get banned

How are you people triggered by a name of someone/something

i sense a flame war coming
http://img.pandawhale.com/156549-JonTron-I-dont-like-where-this-H7gV.gif

I mean, I feel like this might be funny if we knew what the clan tag was.
Are you afraid to say?

Guess that means you got triggered by your own clan tag/name.
